name: Splish (KillianPaquet)
description:
How to play

- Touch the sink to drop blob water

- Move with your finger the black and white circle

- Use the link between the black and white circle to guide blob water to the glass

Why we made this game ?

This game is a project made in 3 months for the 2nd year of study. The contraint was to make game on mobile

Team Killian Paquet : Programming, Level design, Sound design killianpaquetpro@gmail.com Valentin Bouclet : Graphics valbouclet@gmail.com Installation

- Download Splish.apk

- Drag Splish.apk into mobile document file

- Go into your mobile install file to launch game
